title: Cryptoz_media
author: Cryptoz_media
content: Greetings, dear forum members.We would like to tell you about us and our project that will help you become famous throughout the crypto world.We are a Cryptoz team engaged in the full-scale implementation and promotion of crypto projects, including marketing, PR companies, the creation of social networks and the formation of project awareness. This is not the whole list of our services, as you can talk about them for a very long time.You can get any interesting information from our sources or contact us directly.Web: https://cryptoz.mediaTg : https://t.me/cryptozMail : info@cryptoz.mediaYou are Welcome!

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I am surprised that you are a company that presents itself as having experience in advertising and you have not prepared this topic well, such as attaching more pictures and your previous projects. The previous companies that worked with you and the nature of the advertisements you provide, whether they are for small, medium or large projects, the average costs or any detailed information.I checked your site and couldn't find any details.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on October 04, 2023, 06:59:12 AMI am surprised that you are a company that presents itself as having experience in advertising and you have not prepared this topic well, such as attaching more pictures and your previous projects. The previous companies that worked with you and the nature of the advertisements you provide, whether they are for small, medium or large projects, the average costs or any detailed information.I checked your site and couldn't find any details.I also did not manage to find anything about who stands in these educational articles. When I read something about a topic like "how to fill out the declaration correctly and avoid trouble with the tax" I would like to know the expertise and credibility of the one who gives such advice. This is just something written by some random person on the internet, and if it is positioned well on the search engine, I attribute it to good SEO marketing, which has nothing to do with the quality and accuracy of what is written.So who is the team?Quote from: Cryptoz_media on October 03, 2023, 08:05:28 PMWe are a Cryptoz team engaged in the full-scale implementation and promotion of crypto projects, including marketing, PR companies, the creation of social networks and the formation of project awareness. This is not the whole list of our services, as you can talk about them for a very long time
